org.convertertopdf.convert

Class ImageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.convertertopdf.convert.AbstractConverter
      • org.convertertopdf.convert.SimpleFileConverter
        • org.convertertopdf.convert.ImageConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BmpConverter, GifConverter, JpegConverter, PngConverter, TiffConverter

    public abstract class ImageConverter
extends SimpleFileConverter
    Abstract class that is responsible for providing adictional operations to convert image files to PDF.
    Author:
    Thiago Leite e-mail: thiagoleiteecarvalho@gmail.com

        public boolean isImageOverflowPage(com.lowagie.text.Image image)
        Checks if the image width or image height overflow the page size.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to be compared with the page
        Returns:
        true if overflow, false otherwise
